评论详情: I chose this blouse for its color/pattern, and the long sleeves/v-neck, which in person were gorgeous, and a good look for me.It does run a little small so do buy the next size up.  Sadly, this brand doesn't make a 3X, which would be my "next size up".  ;)  Machine wash cool and hang dry to avoid as much shrinkage as possible.I love the green one so much I just purchased the pink one as well - and if it fits, I'll get the blue as well!

评论概述: Love! But they need to preshrink fabric!
评论详情: I love this shirt. Its flowy but flattering and I love the color and pattern. It looks like the pictures. But! I have not washed this shirt yet. Im afraid to. I bought the same shirt from another seller and after hand washing in cold and hang drying it shrunk and i cant wear it. This after ordering a shirt that was too big. I cant order larger than 2xl. I cant believe it shrinks that much in cold water! They should preshrink the material before making it.

I love this blouse . At first it looked like it was too big but after washing it in the washer & putting in dryer very briefly then hanging to dry , it fit me perfect & had no wrinkles . The fabric is a light weight flowing cotton blend , very comfy and not see through. The Hippie/ boho style is very cute & the design covers any extra bulges. I normally wear a XL , Amazon recommended medium. After reading reviews I decided to try the large & due to slight shrinkage , it fit perfectly. It seems to be well made to last for several years.  I am happy with this purchase.
Shrank horribly. Beware.

I was attracted to this blouse because of the colors and pattern. The colors are not as it appears on the model. If anything, it looks faded. The blouse arrived super wrinkled and looks like it will always need to be ironed.
Fits really nicely everywhere except for the length of the sleeves go 3 inches longer than should be
Cute, love it, fits great
Great print and colors. Lightweight for fall. Negative comments are it is very wrinkly. No iron so I spritz it with water and let hang to dry for a bit before getting dresses to go out.
Cute top.. Lightweight fabric..
LOVE THIS BLOUSE, PRETTY & COMFORTABLE👍

Disliked the tightness in the busy. It looked lop sided.

评论概述: Just looks so good. I love it.
评论详情: This looks so good. I love it.
I liked the blouse very much.  It fits very well and comfortable.

material is not the same as the other hobo shirts I purchased from Amazon. This looks like cotton or Rayon in photo. beware of 19.99 amount.!  the rayon is usually in the 39.00 range. My fault for not reading the fine print. live and learn. It is in the goodwill pile.

评论概述: While very pretty the sizing is inconsistent.
评论详情: I bought the green blouse and absolutely love it.  The XL fit me with a nice loose casual fit.  So I ordered the pink.  It is also beautiful but sewn from a different pattern.  It was beautiful but too small.  I ordered up a size to XXL and while larger it didn’t fit.  This version is not like the other.  It’s too small and I will have to send it back.  Too bad the sizing isn’t consistent.  Other than the sizing it is cute.

评论概述: I LOVE this top (in the Blue and Green.)
评论详情: The fabric is perfect - very lightweight and not see-through. The pattern is perfect. The blue and white colors? Feels feminine. Perfect. I’ve already ordered the top in the other two available colors, even though I haven’t washed this one yet. Hoping that it’s perfect after laundering, too.  UPDATE: I’ve now washed it once (on Delicate, cold water) and dried (on Low, removing after only about 15 minutes to hang completely dry.) And guess how it came out? Perfect[ly]!! Almost no wrinkles. No shrinkage or fading colors. HIGHLY recommended.  UPDATE #2: Have now received the green and pink. I’ve not washed either. The green is wonderful. I love it. Same great, comfortable fabric, pattern and fit, as shown. To my sorrow, while the color and pattern of the pink was just what I wanted, the fabric and fit were not. It ran small, but most tragically, it was 100% polyester, and not just that, but the kind of shiny, sleazy polyester that doesn’t breathe and NO ONE wants to wear. But I give the Seller/Amazon a lot of credit because without any dispute whatsoever, I received notice that I’d receive a full refund, and I didn’t have to return it. I’ll donate the unworn blouse, and I’m encouraged to try again when I think I’ve found something I really like.
Like everything about this purchase. The fabric  , print. and fit.  Came back and purchased a 2nd print because I loved it so well.

Color was a lot less lively than in the photo and fabric wrinkles from packaging have not come out inspite of washing. I don’t have an iron and am used to newer fabrics that don’t wrinkle. But it’s very comfortable and I am enjoying this top.
Cool and comfortable fabric. Very pretty print and design. Great value for the price.
Nice top love the color gets very wrinkled have to iron it !

Super soft and cool to wear. The fit is luxuriously flowy. Apt for summer. I could have fit into a smaller size easier but I wanted a loose fit so opted for M
Very feminine and comfortable. More my style than what I have been able to find in department stores.  Will definitely be buying more, in various colors.
Nice material.  It did shrink a bit but I anticipated that and bought a little big

Very pretty, but I will have to do something to let out the upper arm because even though the entire shirt is oversized, the sleeve is very tight fitting.

The shirt is cute.  The colors are nice.  But, I had to LOL when I put it on.  The sleeves were 7 inches longer than where they should land on my wrist.  IDK why that just because we order an XL that companies think we have gorilla arms.

The fabric is gorgeous and washes up nicely (cold wash, hang dry).  No shrinkage as far as I can tell.  The sleeves are a bit long on me and I had to shorten them, but that might just be me.  Overall, I love the top and kept it because it's so pretty!

评论概述: UGH don't put it in the dryer.
评论详情: its a very pretty shirt, however if you are like me and just wash a bunch of clothes at once, and screw up and put this pretty shirt in the dryer, you are going to be sorry. It shrunk up to like almost half the size. I find in this day and age where everyone is so busy, they don't have time to take their clothes to a dry cleaners. Even letting this type of material dry by itself is a bad idea, because it gets all wrinkles in it that are hard to get out. Pretty shirt, but not worth the hassle.
